languages.text: {n}Арбитр на миг застывает, на его губах возникает скупая, но дерзкая улыбка.{/n} "Я могу показать".
{n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр на миг застывает, на его губах возникает скупая, но дерзкая улыбка.{/n} "Я могу показать".

{n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは一瞬体を強張らせたが、やがて唇に薄く、それでいて奔放な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お見せしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは一瞬体を強張らせたが、やがて唇に薄く、それでいて奔放な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お見せしましょう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne erstarrt kurz, und dann bildet sich auf seinen Lippen ein schmales, aber verwegenes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich kann es Euch zeigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne erstarrt kurz, und dann bildet sich auf seinen Lippen ein schmales, aber verwegenes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich kann es Euch zeigen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se tend l'espace de quelques instants, puis un petit sourire canaille se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Les actes sont plus éloquents que les mots. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se tend l'espace de quelques instants, puis un petit sourire canaille se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Les actes sont plus éloquents que les mots. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne endurece el gesto momentáneamente, pero luego esboza una leve sonrisa de complicidad.{/n} «Puedo enseñárselo».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne endurece el gesto momentáneamente, pero luego esboza una leve sonrisa de complicidad.{/n} «Puedo enseñárselo».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙僵住了一会儿，随后唇上露出一丝淡淡的微笑。{/n}“我可以给你演示一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙僵住了一会儿，随后唇上露出一丝淡淡的微笑。{/n}“我可以给你演示一下。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne bir an kasılıyor. Sonrasında dudaklarında ince, haylaz bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Gösterebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bir an kasılır, sonra dudaklarında ince, haylaz bir gülümseme belirir.{/n} "Gösterebilirim."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stiffens for a moment, and then a thin yet rakish smile forms on his lips.{/n} "I can show you."
